biotools.summary: Flnc is software that can accurately identify full-length long noncoding RNAs (lncRNAs) from human RNA-seq data. lncRNAs are linear transcripts of more than 200 nucleotides that do not encode proteins.

bioschemas.name: iFlnc
bioschemas.summary: Flnc is software that can accurately identify full-length long noncoding RNAs (lncRNAs) from human RNA-seq data. lncRNAs are linear transcripts of more than 200 nucleotides that do not encode proteins.
